elements.name: Invalid Token When a GET request is sent to the /api/visitorsPurposeList endpoint with invalid authorization
elements.description:
information, it should be verified that the status code returned is 403 and the message in the response body is
  "You do not have authorization or token error.".

steps.name: The api user sets "api/visitorsPurposeList" path parameters.
The api user sends a GET request, saves the returned response, and verifies that the status code is '403' with the reason phrase Forbidden.

name: As an administrator (admin) I should be able to access the Visitor Purpose List via API connection.
